Amulet (Arcane, Druidic, or Holy Focus), (attunement optional)

A golden amulet shaped like a sun, with a silver symbol of the moon circumscribed within it. You gain a +2 bonus to spell attacks while you are holding the amulet in your hand.

While Attuned

While you have the amulet somewhere on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to the save DCs of spells you cast. You can use both of the following abilities:

  • In the Darkness, Light: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can use a Desperate Action to drop to 1 hit point instead, and may immediately spend up to three rest dice to regain hit points. You cannot use this ability again until the next dawn.
  • In the Light, Darkness: You can cast the spell @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.Z373UKDNQ9VFAMQD]{Syzygy} once from the amulet without spending mana. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for this spell. You cannot use this ability again until you use the amulet’s In the Darkness, Light ability.
